description:
Oota hopes that the extra tools around the pool will give him the means to shock Kashiwada.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kashiwada-san and Oota-kun and Swimming / Tabuchi-san`s Secret / Oota-kun`s Lunch / Kashiwada-san`s Tears
Kashiwada-san to Oota-kun to Suiei / Tabuchi-san no Himitsu / Oota-kun no Ohiru / Kashiwada-san no Namida
柏田さんと太田君と水泳 / 田淵さんの秘密 / 太田君のお昼 / 柏田さんの涙
